contents.text: Thank you for calling Recurly in San Francisco, the subscription management platform delivering unrivaled results to smart brands worldwide.
For Sales and New Subscriptions, press 1.
To learn about pricing, plans, and billing options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team for pricing and plans.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing for the right subscription tier.
I’d like to learn about pricing tiers and any veteran discounts for new subscriptions.
I want to review the pricing tiers and overage fees for the enterprise subscription.
I’d like to understand your subscription plans, what features each includes, and how much they cost per month.
I’d like to understand academic and student pricing tiers and plan features for managing subscriptions for my physics research group.

contents.text: To schedule a product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live product demo this week.
I want to schedule a product demo to see how Recurly fits my veteran-owned business needs.
I need to schedule a live demo to explore the API integration and webhook capabilities.
I need to schedule a live demonstration so I can see how your service works before signing up.
I want to schedule a demo to see how Recurly handles billing workflows for our lab’s recurring software tools.

contents.text: For Customer Support and Account Services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our Technical Support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a recent API integration error.
I need technical assistance with integrating Recurly’s API on my website.
I’m troubleshooting OAuth authentication errors in my Recurly API integration.
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical support to troubleshoot an error on my account.
I’m encountering an authentication error integrating Recurly’s API with our data acquisition system and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our Account Services department.

navigationGoals: Update my payment method and clarify a billing charge.
I need to update my account’s payment method and billing information.
I need to update my payment method and reconcile my usage-based billing records.
I need help reviewing my account and understanding the details of my latest bill.
I need to update our lab’s billing details and review the latest invoices on our subscription account.
